original_text: And he divided the 300 men into three companies and put trumpets into the hands of all of them and empty jars, with torches inside the jars.
korean_text: 삼백 명을 세 대로 나누어 각 손에 나팔과 빈 항아리를 들리고 항아리 안에는 횃불을 감추게 하고

sentences.original_text: And he divided the 300 men into three companies
and put trumpets into the hands of all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 모두의 손에 나팔을 쥐여주고
